headline: How Investors Are Reacting To HCA Healthcare (HCA) Earnings, 2026 Guidance and New Buyback Plan
summary: In late January 2026, HCA Healthcare reported fourth-quarter 2025 revenue of US$19,513 million and net income of US$1,878 million, contributing to full-year revenue of US$75.60 billion and net income of US$6,784 million, alongside new 2026 earnings guidance and a fresh US$10.00 billion share repurchase authorization. Beyond headline results, HCA coupled its nineteenth consecutive quarter of volume growth with rising dividends, large-scale buybacks, and expanding AI-driven efficiency...
